file_content.text: Let this be a reminder to our enemies: the Empire does not lose. Excellent work.
The wargame is now complete. Your squadron gets the win. Excellent work.
We've been routed! Get out of there! Now!
That did not go well for your squadron. You'll have to try harder.
That's it. The wargame's done. You did your best, but it just wasn't enough.
Everyone, fall back! We can fight this fight another day.
The results of this wargame will provide crucial data to Imperial strategists. Move in and tear them apart!
Your enemy's gaining the upper hand!
Blast it! You're letting the odds turn in their favor!
You cannot allow them to hold that advantage.
Don't let their new advantage rattle you!
Their fighters took an objective. Buckle down, team!
They just got an edge on you, but I know you can weather it.
Aygo here. Sometimes there's nothing like a good old-fashioned blast-'em-up. Two squadrons and one goal: take the other team down.
This is Fleet Admiral Aygo. We can deal a major blow to the enemy here if we just take out their squadron.
We've identified key objectives that will be of some help, but your real targets are those fighters--remember that.
You're almost there. Press the attack!
It's nearly over. You have to turn the tide!
We're just about done here. Don't let up!
You can still win this thing, but there isn't much time!
Victory's almost yours--keep fighting!
Time is running short. Annihilate them!
Stay strong out there and watch each other's backs! Show them what you're made of!
You've got some leverage now, team. Don't let it go to waste!
Watch for helpful objectives along the way, but don't get hung up on them. Your skill on offense is what's being tested here.
Take this advantage and run with it!
Let the wargame commence, and may the best squad win!
Objective secured. Now go get 'em!
This is Admiral Ranken. Our moment to truly demoralize the enemy has come. Prepare to engage in a full-on assault.
The objectives marked on your displays will add to your advantage, but your primary task is to obliterate enemy fighters.
You have a greater advantage. Use it.
Show no mercy and win this day for the Empire.
Admiral Ranken here. Your mission in this wargame is to wipe out the opposing squadron. Safety protocols are not in effect.
Take advantage of area objectives for leverage against your opponent, but do not lose sight of your ultimate goal.
Objective secured.
You've earned some leverage. Now take down those fighters!
Great job, squadron. Wargame's over, and the win goes to you!
We did it! You really took it to them. Way to go!
